definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: booty, prey (upon which one advances, falls);—[[יאׁכַל עַד]] Ge 49:27 devour prey (‖[[שָׁלָל]]); [[עַד שָׁלָל מַרְבֶּה]] Is 33:23 prey of great spoil; [[קוּמִי לְעַד]] Zep 3:8 (of God) my rising up to the prey (Br:Mp); [[אֲבִי עַד]] Is 9:5 father i.e. distributor) of booty (Hi Kn Kue Br:Mp Du Che:Hpt; > Ges Ew Di al. everlasting father).
